name: Strings of Divinity | The Spell Plague Demo
name_original: Strings of Divinity | The Spell Plague Demo
description:
A 2D top-down RPG based in a world where magic is corrupt and outlawed. However the people are tired of this rule, and begin to fight back at their draconic overlords.

Game OST

Controls :

WASD / Arrow Keys to Move

Enter / E to interact

X / ESC to open player menu

LShift to Sprint

Enter when in text to skip

Click when in shop to browse wares

To spare enemies, must perform an action on them, and then spare. Doesn't work on bosses

Known Bugs :

Text repeating ( happens at random, save often ) be sure to let us know of any bugs you come across.

What to expect :

6 Quests - 3 Main, 3 Side

3 Worlds - Town, Forest, Dungeon

Randomly dropped loot

Turn based combat ( being updated soon )

Future Updates :

Battle System Update - Better more engaging combat ( targetable parts, enemy magic ETC. )

Multiple Inventories ( Quest items, consumables, equipment )

Selling items

More world - Areas, Quests, NPC's

World Expansion - adding more to the overworld to make it feel more alive

Class System ( Pick and expand upon set classes )

Game is still in development, and has been for a year ( give or take). lot's of effort has gone into all aspect of the project, and we look forward to continuing development with your support! Thank you

- Gigsjaw Team
